general.error_alert_text: Something went wrong! Please try again.
general.name: Name

public.tagline1: Taking the hassle out of organizing public witnessing
public.site_description1: Whether your team is large or small, organizing a group of publishers for public witnessing can be challenging. So we designed SheepStand to help. Using a modern, flexible, user-friendly approach, SheepStand can help you spend less time creating schedules, and more time in the ministry.
public.site_description2: Register for an account or learn more below
public.flexible_desc1: SheepStand works for teams of all sizes. So whether you are organizing a special metropolitan witnessing project with hundreds of publishers, or just a service group, SheepStand can fit your needs.
public.flexible_desc2: Whether you want to assign all shifts without publisher input, or let publishers choose their own shifts, we've got you covered.
public.uf_desc1: We carefully designed SheepStand to be easy-to-use and mobile-friendly. This allows the site to be used whether you're at home or in the field.
public.uf_desc2: We are continuing to translate the site into additional languages. In the meantime, descriptive icons are used so that most features are understandable to everyone.

auth.token_expired_alert_text: Please log in again to continue.
auth.password_reset_link_sent: Password reset link sent successfully. Please check your email.
auth.verify_email_address: We sent you an email with an the verification link.
auth.password_length: Password must be at least {length} characters

account.confirm_delete_vacation: Are you sure you want to delete this vacation?
account.confirm_change_mate: Are you sure you want to update your marriage mate? This will also update your mates account.

teams.confirm_change_owner: Are you sure you want to transfer ownership of this team to the following user?
teams.confirm_delete_team: Are you sure you want to delete this team?
teams.confirm_delete_text: This action cannot be undone. All associated information will be permanently deleted.
teams.confirm_remove_user: Are you sure you want to remove this user from the team?
teams.team_explanation: A team is a group of publishers who work together in public witnessing. For example, this could be your congregation, a special metropolitan witnessing project, or service group
teams.enter_team_code: To join an existing team, enter the code given to you by the brothers overseeing your team.
teams.confirm_create_new_team: Please confirm that you are responsible for overseeing public witnessing and want to create a new team.
teams.confirm_team_message: The following team was found with the code provided. Do you want to join this team?
teams.default_language_hint: This language will be used for sending notifications to your team.
teams.new_team_name_help: This might be the name of your congregation, special metropolitan witnessing program, service group, etc.
teams.confirm_leave_team: Are you sure you want to leave this team?
teams.success_leave_team: You have successfully left the team
teams.error_creating_team: There was an error while creating the team
teams.confirm_location_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this location? This will also delete all shifts using this location.
teams.setting_default_participants_min: Minimum number of participants per shift
teams.setting_default_participants_max: Maximum number of participants per shift

schedules.schedule_visible: Schedule is visible to team members
schedules.schedule_closed: Schedule is finalized and can not be changed by team members
schedules.confirm_delete_schedule: Are you sure you want to delete this schedule?
schedules.confirm_delete_template: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
schedules.confirm_delete_shift: Are you sure you want to delete this shift?
schedules.confirm_approve_all_requests: Are you sure you want to approve all shift requests for this schedule?
schedules.confirm_approve_all_assignments: Are you sure you want to approve all pending assignments for this schedule?

shifts.mandatory_explanation: Only mandatory shifts will be filled when using the Automatic Assignment feature
shifts.trade_with_notification: A notification will be sent to your team
shifts.trade_click_to_accept: Click on a name to accept the shift
shifts.confirm_trade_offer: Are you sure you want to trade this shift?
shifts.confirm_trade_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this trade?
shifts.confirm_reject: Are you sure you want to reject this assignment?
shifts.confirm_accept: Are you sure you want to accept this assignment?
shifts.confirm_remove_request: Are you sure you want to remove this request?
shifts.confirm_remove_shift: Are you sure you want to remove yourself from this shift?
shifts.success_trade_offered: Your team has been notified of your trade offer
shifts.success_trade_offered_publisher: Trade is waiting for approval from the other publisher.
shifts.show_according_to_availability: Only show shifts I am available for
shifts.conflict_shift_adjacent: Adjacent to another assignment at different location

notifications.lets_setup_notifications: Let's setup notifications for your team
notifications.feature_explanation_team: Enabling this feature ensures your team is notified about trade offers, new schedules, etc.
notifications.feature_explanation_user: Enabling this feature ensures you are notified about trade offers, new schedules, etc.
notifications.sheepstand_uses_telegram: SheepStand uses Telegram for notifications. Telegram is a free and secure messaging app, similar to Viber and WhatsApp.
notifications.if_no_telegram_account: If you do not already have a Telegram account, you can download the app from the link below and sign up.
notifications.after_telegram_signup: After signing up for an account, or if you are already a Telegram user, continue to the next step.
notifications.enter_telegram_phone_number: Please enter the phone number linked to your Telegram account. A code will be sent to this number in order to sign in.
notifications.get_telegram_login_code: Open Telegram on your device and find the login code you were sent. Enter the code below.
notifications.2FA_explanation: It looks like you enabled 2-Factor Authentication on your account. Please enter you 2FA password to sign in.
notifications.telegram_signedin: Great! You're signed in to Telegram
notifications.create_telegram_group: Now let's create a Telegram group for your team. Team members can then join the group in order to receive notifications.
notifications.notifications_now_enabled: Congratulations! Notifications have been enabled on your account. You can now access notification settings on the Team Settings page.
notifications.setup_notifications_now: Would you like to setup notifications now?
notifications.subscribe_notifications_now: Would you like to subscribe to notifications now?
notifications.confirm_disable_notifications: Are you sure you want to disable notifications for this team? This cannot be undone.
notifications.notifications_problem_admin: Notifications have been enabled for your team, but there seems to be a problem. Please make sure the 'SheepStand Bot' is an administrator in your group. You can also setup notifications again. However, all existing users will need to join the new Telegram group. You may also contact the support brothers for assistance.

messages.send_to_telegram: Send as message to Telegram group
messages.show_as_banner: Show as a banner on dashboard
messages.confirm_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

system_messages_body.new_schedule_available: A new schedule is available. Click here to view.
system_messages_body.new_trade_offer_team: Someone on your team has offered their shift. Check the @:shifts.trade_requests section of the @:menu.dashboard .
system_messages_body.user_trade_offer: Hey! I would like to trade shifts with you. Here's my offer:
system_messages_body.system_maintenance: Due to necessary system maintenance, SheepStand.com will be unavailable during the following times
